room.title: Lobby
room.description: ************************************************************************************************************************ The room sits perfectly still...too still. I see four possible routes i can take. I breathe in and out, maybe the best advice that therapist has given me. Time to make a decision, the waiting is killing me.... ********************************************************************************************

room.title: Dungeon
room.description: ************************************************************************************************************************ Blackness does not describe this room. For blackness foretells the death of light. Thus this is not the case, there was never light here. This darkness embodies emptiness, a void. There is no life here. There never was.... ************************************************************************************************************************

room.title: Furnace Room
room.description: ************************************************************************************************************************ The Devil's perspiration, oh how thy glimmers as waterfalls. The glow from the fire place cracks and sends devils dancing on these walls. My heart thumps intensely, the beat increases sevenfold.... I stand amidst the fire, yet why am I so cold? ************************************************************************************************************************

room.title: Dinning Room
room.description: ************************************************************************************************************************ The table is set, the candles shine brightly off the chandeliers. Portraits of the deceased hang smartly, pondering my intrusion. Their eyes telling stories I will never know. I get the eerily feeling they are not watching me.... ************************************************************************************************************************
